inclusion.criterion: Patients who have De novo glioblastoma multiforme, anaplastic astrocytoma, anaplastic oligodendrogliomas, mixed anaplastic oligoastrocytomas, gliosarcoma of the Brain, not involving the brain stem or optics chiasm, diagnosed following biopsy or tumor removal.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have a Karnofsky score of < 60 [Appendix B] or age < 18 years.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy of their glioblastomamultiforme, anaplastic astrocytoma, anaplastic oligodendrogliomas, mixed anaplastic oligoastrocytomas, gliosarcoma.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: This was followed by CPT-11 Weekly x4 with Avastin Q2 weeks/ 2 weeks rest and repeat cycle.

exclusion.criterion: Tumors located in the brainstem or optic chiasm.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine

notes: Patient's Karnofsky score and prior chemotherapy/radiotherapy status are unknown.
